title: mri_xvolavg
description: Tool to average multiple volumes together (including 4D volumes).

input_volumes.title: Input volumes
input_volumes.description: Path(s) to input volume(s). This option can be repeated for each input volume.

vol_type.title: Volume type
vol_type.description: Format type of all input volumes.

output_type.title: Output type
output_type.description: Format type of the output volume (default is that of input volumes).
